original: Ihrfelt, Sven Viktor Agne, länsa-s-sessor, Göteborg, f. 25/3/94 i Gbg av ’lärov:adj., fil. dr Gustaf I. o. Ingeborg Mellin. G. 20 m. Maj Sv^edberg. Barn: Sven f. 21, d. 45, Bo 23, jur. stud., Märta 26, g. m. textiling. Bengt Löfmark, Åke 30, stud. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 12, kansliex. i Lund 15. Läns-bokhåll. i Kopparb. 1. 18, sekr. i Falu stads drätselkamm. 21-27, länsassessor i Gbgs o. Boh. 1. 35, sekr, h. sv. hydro-graf.-biolog. komm. sed. 36. Led. av o. v. ordf. i barnavindn f. Vika sm 26-35, v. ordf. i Vika s :ns komm:fuHm. samt tillika led. av beredn :utsk. 31-35, led. av Hosjö förs. kyrkoråd 33-35, statens led. i styr. f. Bergslagets Bostads A-B 27-Z^. RVO, FMM Pro benignitate humiania.
translated: Ihrfelt, Sven Viktor Agne, county court assessor, Gothenburg, born on March 25th, 1894 in Gothenburg to high school teacher, PhD Gustaf I. and Ingeborg Mellin. Married Maj Sv^edberg in 1920. Children: Sven, born in 1921 and died in 1945, Bo born in 1923 and is a law student, Märta born in 1926 and married to textile worker Bengt Löfmark, Åke born in 1930 and is a student. Studied and graduated from high school in Gothenburg in 1912, passed the civil service exam in Lund in 1915. Worked as a county accountant in Kopparberg from 1918 to 1921, secretary in the municipal finance chamber in Falun from 1921 to 1927, county court assessor in the counties of Gothenburg and Bohuslän from 1935 and secretary to the Swedish hydrographic and biological commission since 1936. Member and vice-chairman of the child welfare association for the Vika area from 1926 to 1935, vice-chairman of the Vika parish committee and also a member of the preparatory committee from 1931 to 1935, member of the Hosjö parish church council from 1933 to 1935, and a member of the board for Bergslagets Bostads A-B from 1927 to 19??. Awarded the Royal Victorian Order and the Order of the Polar Star "Pro benignitate humana."

education.name: Passed civil service exam in Lund
